comment: In [azaev2000: 354] and [magomedbekova2001: 232] it's кIе-цIа-ли-да, in [saidova2001: 225] it's кIа-цIа-да.

comment: Tens 20—90, hundreds 200—900, and, apparently, thousands 2 000—9 000 do not have the marker.

value1_name: presence of the marker in numeral 20
comment: Unclear whether tens 20–90 have the marker (cf. ‘20’ as k’ˤa:-c’a in [magomedova2012: 145] but k’ˤa:-c’a-ja in [authierdraft2020: 15]).

comment: 20' qu has no marker on its own but attaches it when multiplied: q’o-no qu=no ‘40’ ([forker2013: 394] interprets this as the additive suffix).

comment: Full form -CM-le is used only after components 1—10 and 20 when they are final or when counting millions. Just -CM is used in final positions in 11—19, 21—29, and in non-final positions in 2—10 and 20.
